comments.content:
Hello,

I'm new to OSMDroid. I want the MapView to display a PNG map stored on my SD card. Can someone please tell me if I need to use BitmapTileSourceBase or any other class for that purpose?

Hi, did you find a solution for that?
I'm having the same problem... =(
Your best bet is to run your map through Mobile Atlas Creator. This should break the tiles up into a system that is compatible with osmdroid. Then use the filesystem tile provider to serve the tiles.
